cause.description:
Amaazon.com is unfair in that it does not ship outside of the U.S. unless you go to amazon.ca,.co.uk,Etc. thus being able to jack up the prices way beyond necessary means. it is this unfairness that drives The Boycott Amaazon.com Coalition.
1. Amazon.com should and will be boycotted
2. Amazon.com is gay
3. All profits go to World Vision
cause.mission: Boycott Amazon.com and all it's affiliates
cause.name: The Boycott Amazon.com Coalition
